overview: This is the story of the lantern carrier, a woman who haunts young Stella at night. Stella, who has to face the very unpredictable and unsettling nature of the lantern carrier, has to find a way to stop these hauntings from continuing. She will learn that the answer on how to stop these hauntings lies deep inside her very own house, in a sad and macabre way.
tagline: Who is knocking on your window at this late hour? Can it be something totally unbelievable like a ghost?
title: The Lantern Carrier
